data.title: Oxford University Innovation on LinkedIn: OUI Incubator moves from startup to scale up
data.meta_description: The OUI Incubator is getting a boost to deliver more opportunities for the University of Oxford's ambitious staff and student #entrepreneurs. New funding, aâ€¦
data.text: We're launching four new digital therapies for anxiety disorders with leading academics at the University of Oxford and partners Koa Health. These therapist-assisted programmes, accessible 24/7 from home, are recommended by NICE - National Institute for Health and Care Excellence. The first programmes will be available in NHS Trusts from September. Developed and clinically validated by experts, at the University of Oxford Department of Psychiatry and Department of Experimental Psychology, they are the culmination of many years of engagement with patients through consultation and clinical trials. Discover the programmes ðŸ‘‰ https://lnkd.in/gypKf6ZK Thanks to our partners at the Wellcome Trust | NHS England | NIHR (National Institute for Health and Care Research) | NIHR Oxford Health Biomedical Research Centre (OH BRC) | NIHR ARC Oxford and Thames Valley (OxTV) | University of Reading | King's College London. #therapy | #digitalhealth | #PTSD | #anxiety | #mentalhealth
